mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.*, rownum rnum FROM ( SELECT i.*, (SELECT sname FROM F_SPORTS s WHERE s.sid=i.sid) AS sname FROM f_teacher i ORDER BY activated DESC , reg_date DESC) t ) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_TEACHER (tid, tname, tinfo, tpicture, sid) VALUES(SEQ_TEACHER_TID.nextval, #{tname}, #{tinfo}, #{tpicture}, #{sid})
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, (SELECT sname FROM F_SPORTS s WHERE s.sid=t.sid) AS sname FROM f_teacher t WHERE tid=#{tid}
mapper.update: UPDATE f_teacher SET tname=#{tname}, tinfo=#{tinfo}, tpicture=#{tpicture}, sid=#{sid}, activated=#{activated} WHERE tid=#{tid}
mapper.select: SELECT tid, tname FROM f_teacher WHERE activated = 'Y' ORDER BY tname
